fn.p: The authors declare no competing financial interests.

Author Contributions Y.G. and X.L. conceived, designed and performed the experiments. Y.G., X.L. and Z.Z. analyzed the data and contributed analysis tools. Y.G. and Z.Z. wrote the paper and prepared the figures and tables. H.W., B.G. and W.G. discussed and wrote the paper. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
